Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen Review

 

 

I’ve had brown spots for the past ten years.  I’ve had procedures to burn them off.  I used acids, peels, and other things to get rid of them and no luck!

I in my newsfeed I saw an ad for a spot remover pen.

I bought it, and when I finally got it (after waiting a month), it wouldn’t hold a charge so, needless to say, it didn’t work.

I did get it to hold a charge for about thirty seconds once but, again, it just didn’t work.

I went to Amazon.com and ordered the “Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen”

Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen Review

At first, I thought it was going to be like the first pen I bought because I had a hard time turning it on.

Turns out, it was me being impatient and not following directions.

The thing about me is that I WANT RESULTS FAST!

After reading the directions, I did get it to turn on and immediately it worked!

The key is to hold down the on/off button for about five seconds and then it turns on.

Next step is to put the  “Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen” straight down on the spot rather than to the side.

Instantly the pen starts burning the spot off.  You can smell your skin burning (I know, gross, but it works).

I did two spots because I wanted to see how it heels before I move on to other areas of my body.  I have a lot of spots from sun damage and taking estrogen when I turned fifty 🙁

So my review of the  “Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen” is good.

I think it works and for $26.00 it’s also a novelty in that, I have wasted far more money on anti-aging and beauty products that did way less.

One last thing.  You will have a very visible wound where you removed the spots.  It takes about five days to heal.

When it healed, the spot wasn’t completely gone but it was fifty percent less.  I’m sure I could have gone deeper initially

I’m sure I could have gone deeper initially and had better results.

However, I can now go back over the spot and repeat the process until it’s gone (I am hoping).

Here’s the link:  “Beauty Mole and Brown Spot Removal Pen”
